response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. However, to make this opportunity even more attractive, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $7,500. This is an excellent chance to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. If you're interested, please let me know, and I'll guide you through the purchase process.", "product_price": 7500}
